brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts the Open Standard HDLC Frame and the Cisco HDLC Frame. The composition of these frames is listed below. Note that the Cisco HDLC frame has a unique type not present in the Open Standard HDLC frame.

Open Standard HDLC Frame
Flag: 8 bits
Address: 8 bits
Control: 8 or 16 bits
Information: Variable length 0, or more bits, multiples of 8
FCS: 16 or 32
Flag: 8 bits

Cisco HDLC Frame
Flag: 8 bits
Address: 8 bits
Control: 8 bits
Type (Protocol Code): 16 bits
Information: Variable length, 0 or more bits, multiples of 8
FCS: 16 bits
Flag: 8 bits
